com.soa.wsf

Class CallingContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.wsf.CallingContext

  • public class CallingContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to calls made through the WSF. Useful for gaining access to binding and transport headers not available through traditional JAX-RPC WSDL based Java interface programming.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CallingContext() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Call finish()
      Finishes the current Call, removing it from the context.
      Call get()
      Returns the current Call being executed in the WSF.
      static CallingContext getInstance()
      Provides global access to the WSF calling context.
      void start(Call c)
      Adds a new Call to the context, essentially "starting" the Call.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CallingContext

        public CallingContext()

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Call get()
        Returns the current Call being executed in the WSF.
        Returns:
        Current Call. Null, if no Call currently being executed.

      • start

        public void start(Call c)
        Adds a new Call to the context, essentially "starting" the Call.
        Parameters:
        c - Call being executed.

      • finish

        public Call finish()
        Finishes the current Call, removing it from the context.
        Returns:
        Finished Call.

      • getInstance

        public static CallingContext getInstance()
        Provides global access to the WSF calling context.
        Returns:
        WSF CallingContext.
